,,, 3A Switching Charger;Monolithic Power Systems;MP2617;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = MLWG2-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^MLWG2-[A-F0-9]{4}$, |default_ch = |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WMTM-171GN |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2016 |fccapprovdate = 04/10/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WMTM-171GN_WiFi_V01" is silkscreened on the CPU board.
"WMTM-171GN_Power_V02 is silkscreened on the MCU board. :OEM: [[Gemtek]] WMTM-171GN ===Hardware specifications=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N @580MHz (MIPS 24KEc) :802.11bgn (2T2R) WiSoC, used 1x antenna/streams *RAM: 64MB (DDR2 SDRAM) *Storage: 16MB (Serial Flash) *Battery: 4640mAh 3.8V (Li-ion) ==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/kingston/mlwg2 ''Kingston MobileLite Wireless MLWG2'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N 802.11bgn (1T1R) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12805D (16MB) :RAM: ''SK hynix'' H5PS5162KFR (64MB) :WAN: 1x FE (100Mbps) • [http://up.picr.de/19745980tv.jpg PCB image] *[https://github.com/gmacario/kingston-mlwg2-hack/wiki/Upgrading-MLWG2-Firmware-to-2.0.0.6 ''Kingston MLWG2 Firmware 2.0.0.6'' on '''GitHub] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/kingston/kingston_mlwg2 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/kingston/mlwg2 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7620 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== *[[Kingston MobileLite Wireless G1 (MLW221)]] • [https://www.kingston.com/us/wireless/wireless_readers/mlw221 PPage] *[[Kingston MobileLite Wireless G2 (MLWG2)]] • [https://www.kingston.com/us/wireless/wireless_readers/mlwg2 PPage] *[[Kingston MobileLite Wireless G3 (MLWG3)]] • [https://www.kingston.com/us/wireless/wireless_readers/mlwg3 PPage] *[[Kingston MobileLite Wireless Pro (MLWPro)]] • 64GB storage [[Category:English Documentation]]
